author: Simon Kent
title: U.N. Expert Disappointed in U.S. Coronavirus Response: ‘Must Improve Strategy’
description: The U.N. Special Rapporteur on extreme poverty and human rights has warned significant portions of America face destitution unless Congress takes "far-reaching" actions to stem the financial damage driven by the Chinese coronavirus epidemic.
content:
The U.N. Special Rapporteur on extreme poverty and human rights has warned significant portions of America face destitution unless Congress takes “far-reaching” actions to stem the financial damage driven by the Chinese coronavirus epidemic.
